MACROHABITAT. — Riparian habitats, shrublands, broadleaved forests, wetlands, coniferous forests.

NOTES . — According to Grimm (1985) , two morphotypes of
Z. apricorum
can be distinguished. As expected, the examined material in this work corresponds to the Southern morphotype.
